name: Pegasus Rising
description:
“As Time Stood Still,” curated by Luis Santana and co-curated by Kiara Cristina Ventura, is a NFT  photography solo exhibition highlighting the works of artist and documentarian Luis Santana Taking place at the Mynt Gallery, an experimental NFT Lab and art gallery in Chelsea, the exhibition is Santana’s first NYC solo exhibition, and is his 


Upon purchasing this NFT, you will receive a physical print.  To authenticate the purchase of this piece, you can reach out to the photographers studio to claim your print: luissantanaphoto@gmail.com. 

Type: Inkjet Print
26x26 Frame
24X24 Print
